games.summary: Brandon Ingram scored 30 points, including two key 3-pointers late, Scottie Barnes had 26 points and 13 assists, and the Toronto Raptors used a fast start to defeat the Indiana Pacers 115-101 on Wednesday night. Pascal Siakam led the Pacers with 26 points and 10 rebounds.
blurbs: ⬆️ Johnny Furphy (IND) played 26 min (season avg: 16). 10 pts, 10 reb, 2 ast.
📋 Jamison Battle (TOR) made just his 2nd start this season. 5 pts, 3 reb.
⬆️ Collin Murray-Boyles (TOR) played 33 min (season avg: 21). 10 pts, 10 reb, 3 ast.
📋 Jamal Shead (TOR) made just his 4th start this season. 7 pts, 3 reb.
⬆️ Gradey Dick (TOR) played 30 min (season avg: 16). 21 pts, 11 reb, 3 ast.

games.summary: Donovan Mitchell had 35 points and nine assists, Darius Garland scored 20 points before leaving with an injured foot and the Cleveland Cavaliers beat the Philadelphia 76ers 133-107 on Wednesday night. Joel Embiid scored 20 points and hit a 3-pointer that helped him reach 13,000 career points , the seventh player in team history to hit that mark.

Nikola Vucevic made a tiebreaking layup with 4 seconds remaining, and the Chicago Bulls overcame Brice Sensabaugh 's career-high 43 points to beat the Utah Jazz 128-126 on Wednesday night. Vucevic scored 35 points to lead the Bulls, who had five reserves finish in double figures.
blurbs: 📋 Cody Williams (UTAH) made just his 4th start this season. 6 pts, 7 reb.
📋 Isaiah Collier (UTAH) made just his 3rd start this season. 8 pts, 0 reb.
⬆️ Brice Sensabaugh (UTAH) played 34 min (season avg: 21). 43 pts, 5 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: Trey Murphy III scored 34 points, Saddiq Bey made a tying 3-pointer, converted an offensive rebound into a dunk and hit two free throws in the final 1:04, and the New Orleans Pelicans edged the Brooklyn Nets 116-113 on Wednesday night. Egor Demin scored 17 points and hit five 3s, the last of them giving the Nets a 110-107 lead with 1:28 to go.
blurbs: ⬆️ Yves Missi (NO) played 34 min (season avg: 18). 12 pts, 12 reb, 4 ast.
📋 Drake Powell (BKN) made just his 3rd start this season. 16 pts, 5 reb.

games.summary: Jamal Murray scored 33 points and the Denver Nuggets held on for a 118-109 victory over the Dallas Mavericks , who were without Cooper Flagg for the second half after the rookie No. The 19-year-old former Duke standout scored six points in 15 minutes.
blurbs: 📋 Jaden Hardy (DAL) made just his 3rd start this season. 8 pts, 4 reb.
⬆️ Caleb Martin (DAL) played 23 min (season avg: 10). 15 pts, 4 reb, 3 ast.
⬆️ Jalen Pickett (DEN) played 28 min (season avg: 16). 9 pts, 6 reb, 3 ast.

games.summary: SACRAMENTO, Calif. -- — DeMar DeRozan scored 27 points to move into 22nd place on the NBA’s career scoring list, and the Sacramento Kings beat the New York Knicks 112-101 on Wednesday night.
blurbs: ⬆️ Precious Achiuwa (SAC) played 39 min (season avg: 20). 20 pts, 14 reb, 2 ast.
⬆️ Tyler Kolek (NY) played 24 min (season avg: 14). 7 pts, 5 reb, 5 ast.

games.summary: -- — Kawhi Leonard scored 33 points and James Harden added 22 points as the Los Angeles Clippers extended their winning streak to four games with a 119-105 victory over the Washington Wizards on Wednesday night. Kyshawn George scored 23 points and Khris Middleton added 17 for the Wizards who lost their fourth consecutive game and fell to 0-2 on a four-game road trip.
blurbs: 📋 Kobe Sanders (LAC) made just his 5th start this season. 11 pts, 1 reb.
⬆️ Yanic Konan Niederhauser (LAC) played 23 min (season avg: 8). 16 pts, 5 reb, 2 ast.
⬆️ Jordan Miller (LAC) played 34 min (season avg: 15). 11 pts, 10 reb, 5 ast.
⬆️ Cam Christie (LAC) played 21 min (season avg: 9). 2 pts, 2 reb, 2 ast.
⬆️ Will Riley (WSH) played 27 min (season avg: 13). 12 pts, 2 reb, 1 ast.
